name: WinRateByOwner
functionalRequirements:
## Win Rate By Owner

### Purpose
Visualize win rates by deal owner/sales rep.

### Features
- Bar chart visualization
- Owner performance comparison
- Win/loss ratios
- Sortable by metrics

dataRequirements.description: Receives owner performance data from parent

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- ownerData: Array of owner performance metrics
- sortBy: Sort field
- onOwnerClick: Owner selection handler
